entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
